meta.description: Optimize the production of strawberry and sugar cookies to maximize profit under demand and production constraints.

sets.name: COOKIES
sets.description: Types of cookies produced by the bakery.

params.name: demand
params.description: Maximum daily demand for each type of cookie.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Maximum number of cookies that can be produced per day.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of cookies to produce for each type.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling cookies.

constraints.name: production_capacity
constraints.description: Total production capacity constraint for cookies.
